text: (dutare,) i riti navu nam'ma appaneyante nim'ma kadege divya sandesavannu kalisiruvevu. I hinde nivu granthavendarenu athava nambike endarenu embudannu ballavaragiralilla. Higirutta navu idannu (i granthavannu) belakagisi kaluhisidevu. I mulaka navu nam'ma dasara paiki navicchisuvavarige saridariyannu torisuvevu. Nivu khanditavagiyu (janarannu) susthiravada sanmargadedege munnadesuviri
